name: home

page_blocks.web_template_values: {"title":"Bhumi Campus Awards - MH, TN, KA, DL & PB Edition","subtitle":"Asia's first-ever unique awards to recognize socially responsible colleges. One-of-its-kind attempt to learn from and strengthen Tamil Nadu , Karnataka, Delhi and Punjab college's focus on building the future change-makers of this country.\n","cta_url":"#explore-section","cta_label":"Explore"}

{"first_section_description":"If you belong to any college/university of Tamilnadu, Karnataka, Delhi & Punjab register below and get recognized for your exceptional work towards social change.","first_section_image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/registration.png","first_section_cta_label":"Register now","first_section_cta_url":"/college-interest-application","second_section_description":"If you are a student/alumni/parent, cast your vote for the most deserving college to increase their chances of winning!","second_section_image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/vote-now.png","second_section_cta_label":"Voting starts from March 2023","second_section_cta_url":"/leaderboard","third_section_description":"If you are a student/alumni/parent, nominate your College if you agree /aware that the College has done exceptional work towards Social change","third_section_image":"https://bhumi-awards.frappe.cloud/files/Nominate.png","third_section_cta_label":"Nominate","third_section_cta_url":"college-nomination-form"}

{"title":"Why are we hosting these awards?","columns":"3","features":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"Promoting","content":"Promoting the spirit of doing good and volunteerism among Tamilnadu, Karnataka, Delhi & Punjab colleges.","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/promoting.png"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"Learning","content":"Learning from the most socially conscious colleges and amplifying practices in other colleges.","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/learning.png"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","title":"Empowering","content":"Accelerate the effort to empower youth in Tamilnadu, Karnataka, Delhi & Punjab to play a stronger role in building our nation.","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/empowering.png"}]}

{"title":"Bhumi Campus Awards","subtitle":"Vision To help build a more influential, equal and socially conscious society.","columns":"4","videos":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","youtube_id":"3eETOGfG2nA","title":"Mission To drive social change by fostering an environment where young adults and children learn, lead, and thrive"}]}

{"title":"Process","subtitle":"How do we do this?","process_steps":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"1. Nominations","description":"The awards team invites applications. Colleges can self-nominate themselves. The public or students can also nominate/vote for specific colleges.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/nomination.png"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"2. Applications","description":"Nominated colleges are reached out to and asked to submit details in a detailed form about their effort and initiatives to be socially conscious.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/applications.png"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 3","title":"3. Selection","description":"An expert crew of jury would be evaluating the nominations based on fixed criteria and details submitted by the college. Final awardees for each category are selected based on the college’s score in the criteria and/or the number of public votes.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/selection.png"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 4","title":"4. Award Ceremony","description":"All the nominated colleges and the awardees are invited for the final  award ceremony where awards are given and guest speeches are delivered on making Tamilnadu, Karnataka, Delhi & Punjab colleges more socially responsible.","image":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/awards.png"}]}

{"title":"Categories ","subtitle":"Awards will be given under multiple categories. We believe this will enable recognition, learning, and sharing of best practices across multiple key aspects in a college.","columns":"3","features":[{"idx":1,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 1","title":"Most Socially Responsible Campus","content":"","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/social-responsibility.png"},{"idx":2,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 2","title":"Best Volunteer Engagement","content":"","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/volunteerism.png"},{"idx":3,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 5","title":"Most Eco-Friendly Campus","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/greenery.png"},{"idx":4,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 9","title":"Most Socially Responsible Staff","content":"","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/staff-social-responsibility.png"},{"idx":5,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 11","title":"People Choice Winner","icon":"/assets/bhumi_awards_portal/images/inclusion.png"},{"idx":6,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 8","title":"Most active Bhumi Club","icon":"https://bhumi-awards.frappe.cloud/files/Active.png"},{"idx":7,"__islocal":true,"name":"row 8","title":"Most Socially Responsible Student change driver","icon":"https://bhumi-awards.frappe.cloud/files/Social_Responsible_Student.png"}]}
